original_text: But if he does not listen, take one or two others along with you, that every charge may be established by the evidence of two or three witnesses.
korean_text: 만일 듣지 않거든 한두 사람을 데리고 가서 두세 증인의 입으로 말마다 확증하게 하라

sentences.original_text: But if he does not listen
take one or two others along with you
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 한두 사람을 더 데리고 가라

sentences.original_text: that every charge may be established
by the evidence of two or three witnesses
